text: "Longview" is the first major-label single released by punk band Green Day. It is from their 1994 album Dookie. == Chart position == * #1 (US Modern Rock) * #13 (US Mainstream Rock) * #30 (UK) * #34 (Australia) * #36 (US Radio Airplay) Category:1994 songs Category:Green Day songs Category:Songs about drugs
title: Longview (song)
